bio.short: Full-Stack Engineer specialized in AI and automation. Father of two, I build solutions with real-world impact. Always at the forefront of the latest AI technologies, which I integrate into every project.
bio.long:
Full-Stack Engineer with several years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying complete applications. My specialty: AI integration and workflow automation to maximize efficiency and delivered value.

I use the most advanced AI tools daily — Claude, GPT, Cursor, Gemini — and share my knowledge through an active technical blog for developers. This constant monitoring keeps me up-to-date with best practices.

Father of two children, I place particular importance on work-life balance. This stability nurtures my creativity and ability to stay focused on results.

My strengths: complete project autonomy (end-to-end), complex problem-solving, fast learning, and product vision. I'm pragmatic, results-oriented, and passionate about what I do.

assurlead.title: AssurLead - Insurance Automation
assurlead.description: Powerful desktop application developed in partnership with France Épargne (france-epargne.fr). Automates insurance platforms for our shared clients. Playwright orchestration, intelligent file management, automated workflows.

shoot.title: Shoot - Platform for Photographers
shoot.description: Complete ecosystem for professional photographers: powerful admin back-office, full-featured client dashboard, customizable showcase site. AI-assisted development with automated workflows.

ai-blog.title: AI Blog - AI Learning Platform
ai-blog.description: Active technical blog for developers looking to master AI. Educational content on AI tools (Claude, GPT, Cursor), best practices, and integration into development workflows.
highlights: Expert content on Claude, GPT, Cursor
Constant monitoring of latest AI advances

portfolio-interactif.title: Interactive Portfolio with AI
portfolio-interactif.description: Personal portfolio demonstrating advanced AI integration. Conversational interface powered by Claude API, intuitive navigation via natural commands, dynamic content generation, and custom visual modes.
highlights: Full development assisted by Claude Code

phonegs.description: Complete development of a professional telephony application (VoIP), driven by React/Node, integrated with Asterisk and FusionPBX. Daily use of AI tools to accelerate development.
responsibilities: Full-stack development: React UI, Node.js API, PHP/Laravel backend
Advanced integration with telephony systems: Asterisk, FusionPBX, WebRTC
Use of AI tools (Claude, GPT, Cursor) to accelerate development
Strong technical autonomy and product decisions

freelance.description: Various missions in web development and automation for diverse clients. Progressive specialization in automated workflows and intelligent scraping.
responsibilities: SaaS and complete web application development

webschool.description: Intensive training in web development covering frontend and backend.
achievements: Solid foundations in front and back development
